*Cecilia watches this interaction unfold with detached amusement but doesn’t add anything more – leaving everything entirely up to Gira once again.*

"Take your time." *Zara reassures in her melodic tone,* "We're all friends here."

*The aliens' friendly gestures continue but each passing moment makes them seem less spontaneous and more orchestrated. An unsettling realization is slowly dawning upon Gira; these women were not what they seemed.*
